Are you looking for these?
- Faster Servers
- Brilliant Support
- Affordable Prices
- Reliability & Stability

If your answer is yes, Limenex is your answer. Enjoy premium web hosting service at economic rates! Limenex prides itself at delivering a reliable and unparalleled service by providing customers with blazing fast SSD servers, amazing uptime, incredible tech support and many other amazing perks at wallet-friendly rates.

We are currently running a limited-time promotion with aggressive discounts! Why pay other hosts twice our price only to receive half of our service or pay half our price to receive awful service from them? Sign up with Limenex now to experience quality web hosting service like never before!

=================================================

★ WHY LIMENEX? ★

  • Operating Since 2010
    Limenex has been in business for 7 years and counting! This is a testament to our reliability and quality of service our customers expect of us. We aren't amateurs in the business.
  • Fast & Incredible 24/7 Support
    We have incredible staffs on standby 24/7 to watch over our servers and assist you! We pride ourselves with our industry leading response time of 10-15 minutes!
  • High Performance Servers
    We build our powerful enterprise-grade servers with Dual Intel Xeon Processors, 32GB-128GB RAM, solid state drives (SSD) in RAID 10 plus some in-house optimisation techniques and many more, designed to deliver amazing performance and reliability for your websites!
  • Amazing Prices
    We are priced at extremely competitive and affordable rates to keep our customers happy and ensure we can deliver a consistently reliable service in the long run.
  • Features-rich Hosting
    Our hosting plans are rich with incredible features and services including LiteSpeed, CloudLinux, R1Soft, SpamExperts, SEO tools, CloudFlare, Softaculous script installer, RV Site Builder and many more!
  • 99.9% Uptime
    Keeping your websites up is our bread and butter. Unlike most of our competitors that offer negligible compensation, as written in our industry-leading SLA, we will give you a FULL month of FREE service if the uptime for the given month is less than 99.9%.
  • US & UK Servers
    We have servers in United States & United Kingdom! Take your closest pick for the fastest speed for your websites!
  • Instant Activation
    Why wait for someone to setup your account manually when we setup your account instantly after you made payment?
  • 30 Days Moneyback Guarantee
    Try our service risk-free with our 30 days moneyback guarantee! Feel free to ask for a refund within your first 30 days of service if you are unhappy with our service, which we highly doubt you will be.

★ CUSTOMERS FEEDBACK ★

We aren't lying when we say our service is top-notch. Take a look at what our clients say about us!

There is no justice if I don't write this review for Limenex! Do they sleep at all? The longest I had to wait for a reply was 31 minutes. Most of the time I receive 5 minutes reply from them! My other hosters usually take 1 or 2 hours to tell me something useless, even though they are more expensive! My websites at Limenex are very fast and they even have r1soft backup which is very useful as I used it to restore a file I accidentally deleted for free! One of my other hoster even charge money to only restore my entire cPanel!

Limenex is excellent value for money. I will move all my websites to Limenex once my contract with other hosters expire. Cheaper and better service.

I'm writing this review for Limenex who has been for my host for nearly two months.

I've first signed up with Limenex when I saw their advertisement on the Shared Hosting Offers and I was really impressed by their great looking website design, prices, and disk space/bandwidth limits. My websites that I have hosted with Limenex have always been loading lighting fast, even when they switched from Varnish to Litespeed. All my support tickets have been handled to my satisfaction within hours and I couldn't ask for a better host.

Reliability: 10/10
Support: 10/10
Speed & Performance: 10/10
Price: 10/10
